body.name: Hasuit Floating Bed Frame Queen Size with LED Lights, Metal Platform Queen Bed, No Box Spring Needed, Easy to Assemble (Queen)
features: 【Modern Floating Bed】 The floating bed frame queen size is supported by inside legs on the reinforced main frame, which provides adequate stabilizing support while still making the bed appear to be floating in mid-air. Combined with the three side light strips under the bed, gives it a more modern feel.

【Under-bed Smart LED Lights】 The bed frame is equipped with three side hidden light strips under the bed frame. The LED light with a variety of colors and light patterns to choose from. You can also adjust the light change by APP or key control, In addition to directly adjusting the light in the APP, you can also set the music, voice, and timing modes, to discover more wonderfully!

【Sturdy, Stable, Durable】The frame around the perimeter is 38mm x 25mm iron pipe and the cross core frame and 9 support legs are 25mm x 25mm iron pipe. Each part of the connection is a tested design to make the queen size bed frame stronger and more durable.

【Mattress Slide Stopper】Each metal platform bed frame comes with 4 mattress slide stoppers. Simply press it onto the mounted metal bed frame, made of high-quality material for durability, no screws are required, customized for a perfect fit, and prevents any unwanted movement or sliding of the mattress.

【Easy Assembly & Service】 The bed frame is accompanied by detailed instructions numbering accessories, and assembly video, If your bed frame arrives damaged, scratched, or missing part, or other trouble please feel free to contact us. Our after-sales service will reply within 24 hours.
【No Box Spring Needed】 After the package arrives and is successfully assembled according to the instructions, place the mattress directly on the bed frame in your bedroom, and it is ready to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good price for frame and lights
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together. Good frame. The light is a the thick tape kind, which I prefer over the skinny tape lights. I suggest installing the lights inside the frame. We installed them under the frame and you can see the tape.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not bad for the price, but could use some updates.
reviews.reviewText: I bot this bed frame because I was tired of kicking the legs of the bed every day. So having the legs set back farther under the frame was a big plus. It was also easy for one person to assemble. It is very sturdy and does not creak or squeak.However, the bed sits MUCH lower to the floor than what it portrays in the ad. If you use a box spring, then it will be fine, but if you are using it as a platform bed, then be prepared to be lower to the ground.Also, the LED lights will NOT stay attached. The adhesive is too weak, and they just fall down after a few hours. I am going to try getting more clips and see if that helps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Is it worth it idk
reviews.reviewText: The lights provided weren’t enough to go around the whole bed thankfully we planned to have the bed against the wall so we just changed it so the part where there is like 12-18 inches of no lights is against the wall.Additional complaint the bars that go across the bottom didn’t fit. We had to take the little plastic stoppers that were on the ends off to get them to fit and the plastic stoppers were not easy to get out what should have taken 2-3 minutes for that part took us about 10Once out together it looks nice but I don’t understand why some of the bars fit and others didn’t and then the light situation was ridiculous and thankfully we didn’t have plans to put the bed in the center of the room

reviews.reviewerName: This seller is amazing and very helpful I had questions regarding my package and got a reply right away the bed was very easy to assemble I recommend
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble, durable, seller replies right away
reviews.reviewText: I’m in love the best is gorgeous

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my granddaughter and when she showed it to me after they put it up, I was so dissatisfied. It’s suppose to look like it’s floating in the picture and I’m the description but after it was put together, it looks like a regular frames bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's very low but I expected that. It does appear to be floating you can only see the feet at certain angles. The led light strip was kind of a pain in the butt as it does not fully go around so becatefull with your starting point and also have a bunch of super glue on hand cause there lights do not stick.... Other then that black zip ties and a good length of tube lights would be a better solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looks great, functions as should. However..
reviews.reviewText: Visually and bead frame support is great. Pretty easy to put together. The however is what most people talk about here are the lights. I will say the lights work as should and look wonderful helping it complete that floating look. The problem is they don't stick. I used the few support things they have that come with it. Those stick very well. The backing of the actual lights do not. I stopped the blue part of the back of the lights and wrapped into around the frame. I may cover this with black electrical in the future. This seemed to work pretty well. Overall as advertised and a great looking frame. The lights stickiness nonexistent but you can manage with some creativity. 4 out 5 due the lights since that is part of the product. Probably could replace the lights with a higher end light system on you own but why do that

reviews.reviewerName: Danni’s floating bed Danni’s floating bed
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The floating illusion is good. A little low to the ground but I added a box spring so it’s ok. Not difficult at all to put together and sturdy so far. Good product for the price!
